From Unity House. He comes to me, Miriam. He talks to me. He reminds me that I was supposed to go with them that night--

To us.

we see it in these fringe religious groups... these instant creeds with pseudo-Messianic delusions.

Wonderful! Wonderful! I've been waiting and waiting for her to finally show real anger--real emotion! This could be a breakthrough!
Thank you, Lieutenant.

Doctor Goldman. I believe your tenure with my clinic has just come to an end.
Security? Would you please escort Dr. Goldman off the premises?
Dr. Goldman.

Let her go. She needs it.
Let her go. Let her go and I'll forget your disobedience.

You want an example? How about EVERY FUCKING DOCTOR in this entire hospital? Do you think I'm just going to let myself slowly dissolve into nothingness here?!
I'm talking about a glorious glory.

Good! Get mad--get angry--but not at me--at these fantasies--!
